name: Blade Rage
description:
Made by a group of four people, Blade Rage is a BTU style-game made for our second semester at our Game Design school.

We had some constraints wich were :

- Make a BTU game.

- Work on Construct 2 engine.

- 2D sidescrolling

The game is in a very early WIP. We would like to add better transitions between levels, boss system, online leaderboard and much more.
